Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSense.getFreebaseURI()
    Freebase will be shut-down soon.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset.getFreebaseURIs(Language...)
    Freebase will be shut-down soon.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSenses(Language, String)
    use BabelNet.getSenses(String, Language) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSenses(Language, String, BabelPOS)
    use BabelNet.getSenses(String, Language, BabelPOS) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSenses(Language, String, BabelPOS, BabelSenseSource...)
    use BabelNet.getSenses(String, Language, BabelPOS, BabelSenseSource...) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset.getSenses(Language, String, BabelSenseSource...)
    use BabelSynset.getSenses(String, Language, BabelSenseSource...) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSynsets(Language, String)
    use BabelNet.getSynsets(String, Language) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSynsets(Language, String, BabelPOS)
    use BabelNet.getSynsets(String, Language, BabelPOS) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSynsets(Language, String, BabelPOS, BabelSenseSource...)
    use BabelNet.getSynsets(String, Language, BabelPOS, BabelSenseSource...) instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet.getSynsetsFromWikipediaTitle(Language, String, BabelPOS)
    use BabelNet.getSynsets(ResourceID... resourceId) instead.

    Example: 

     List<BabelSynset> synset = bn.getSynsets(new WikipediaID("BabelNet", Language.EN, BabelPOS.NOUN));
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.data.BabelGloss.getTokensId()
    use BabelGloss.getTokenIds() instead.
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelImage.getValidatedThumbURL()
    use getThumbURL() Gets a verified version of the Thumb URL this image. Checks whether possible URLs of this image (including redirections)
    it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelImage.getValidatedURL()
    use getURL() Gets a verified version of the full URL this image. Checks whether possible URLs of this image (including redirections)
